titleStmt.title: A synopsis of theology or divinity. Drawn up by Francis Roberts, M.A. minister of the gospel, for the benefit of his flock.
titleStmt.author: Roberts, Francis, 1609-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Young, for John Bartlet, at the signe of the Gilt-Cup, under Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "March 19th 1644"; the 5 in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Gilt-Cup, under Austins Gate
